title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: When performing a 'copy package' operation in the package viewer of project A, the destination project (project X) unexpectedly contains a package 'ui'.
OB: After performing the 'copy package' operation from project A to project X, the package 'ui' is created in project X.
EB: The expected behavior is that the 'copy package' operation should create a package in the destination project (project X) with the same name as the source package from project A.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new project (project A). 
2. Open the package viewer. 
3. Select a package in project A. 
4. From the context menu, choose the 'copy' option. 
5. Specify project X as the destination project for the copied package. 
6. Verify that the package 'ui' is created in project X instead of the expected package name.
